text: Teamwork ([[ACOLYTE]]). Villainous. When Defeated: The player who defeated Fabian Cortez discards cards from the encounter deck until an [[ACOLYTE]] minion is discarded, then puts that minion into play engaged them.

name: Amelia Voght
text: Stalwart. Teamwork ([[ACOLYTE]]). When Defeated: The player who defeated Amelia Voght is confused. If they are already confused, place 2 threat on the main scheme.

name: Senyaka
text: Teamwork ([[ACOLYTE]]). [star] Senyaka's attacks gain piercing. When Defeated: The player who defeated Senyaka is stunned. If they are already stunned, they take 3 damage.

name: Delgado
text: Retaliate 1. Teamwork ([[ACOLYTE]]). When Defeated: Discard each stunned and confused card from the villain and give it a facedown boost card.

name: Unuscione
text: Teamwork ([[ACOLYTE]]). Toughness. When Defeated: Give the villain a tough status card. If the villain already has a tough status card, heal 4 damage from it.

name: Zeal for the Cause
text: When Revealed: Resolve the "When Defeated" ability of each [[Acolyte]] minion engaged with you. If you are not engaged with an [[Acolyte]] minion, discard cards from the encounter deck until a minion is discarded, then reveal it.

name: The Acolytes
text:
Each [[Acolyte]] minion gains guard.

text:

text: Victory 1. Attached minion gets +4 hit points and gains the [[Sentinel]] trait. When Revealed: Search the encounter deck, discard pile, and set-aside area for your nemesis minion. Put it into play engaged with you and attach this card to it.
